      • allowedCellsShoot

        public java.util.List<Cell> allowedCellsShoot()
        if the player has one or two moves before the shoot, CONTROLLER HAS TO CHECK IF THE LIST IS EMPTY OR NOT
        Returns:
        the List of the cells where the player can move in order to be able to shoot someone

      • allowedCellsMove

        public java.util.List<Cell> allowedCellsMove()
        called by controller
        Returns:
        the list of cells where the player can move in a move action based on its state

      • allowedCellsGrab

        public java.util.List<Cell> allowedCellsGrab()
        called by controller
        Returns:
        the list of cells where the player can move in a grab action based on its state

      • visibleCells

        public java.util.List<Cell> visibleCells()
        Returns:
        the cells that the player can see

      • visibilePlayer

        public java.util.List<Player> visibilePlayer()
        useful to update thor visibility
        Returns:
        the players that the player can see (excluding himself)

      • virtualAmmo

        public int[] virtualAmmo()
        I wrote this method to simplify the method canIPay() it considers the powerUps in the total count of the Ammo
        Returns:
        an array of 3 int: (index 0: total red Ammo, index 1: total blue Ammo, index 2: total yellowAmmo)

      • canIPay

        public java.lang.Boolean canIPay(Ammo cost)
        tells if the player can pay a cost
        Parameters:
        cost - the cost I have to pay
        Returns:
        true if I can pay the cost (considering also powerup)

      • mustPayWithPowerup

        public boolean mustPayWithPowerup(Ammo cost)
        Called only if canIPay is true
        Parameters:
        cost - cost to pay in Ammo
        Returns:
        true if I have to pay with powerups

      • payingPoweups

        public java.util.List<Powerup> payingPoweups(Ammo cost)
        this method has to be called only when I'm sure I can pay the cost ( canIpay returns true )
        Parameters:
        cost - cost to pay
        Returns:
        the powerups that I can use to pay a cost, returns an empty list if I don't have powerups or they are not of the right color

        Returns:
